website_summaries.verdict: Rich cream that goes a long way, and also hydrates for hours.
pros: Lines and wrinkles are visibly softer after applying
Souffle-like cream absorbs well and tightens up skin
cons: Some feel that the results wear off during the day

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Neck firming cream, good quality product, I’ve been using Clarins for years. Sadly too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Hadeel

customer_reviews.title: Good moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: It is a good moisturizer at best. No results, no improvements. Fairly greasy, so I used it only as a night cream.
customer_reviews.author: W.E.

customer_reviews.title: Feels very nicely
customer_reviews.text: Good product as always, I don’t know if it has a magic to erase the wrinkles on one’s Neck but it feels so good when apply, the consistency is between lotion and serum so feels light weight but hydrating, fast absorption, not greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This one woks the best. I like the texture and how it feels ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used similar products. This one woks the best. I like the texture and how it feels going on.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Hoeplinger

customer_reviews.title: So far I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: So far I like it very much ! I ve have been use it only for almost two months, but I like the texture, the smell and it does not feel greasy. Im planning to buy it again😊
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: ‘This is the second bottle I bought, much cheaper over Macy’s, will keep coming back
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good cream. I am not sure about the effectiveness. At least I feel more hydrated while using it
customer_reviews.author: AMaZN

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it highly and will make this part of my ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using daily for about 2 months now and see a noticeable difference in the skin on my neck. It won't give you the same look as plastic surgery but it will help. Recommend it highly and will make this part of my daily routine for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Dal Asher

customer_reviews.title: THEIR EYE MAKE UP REMOVER EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: CANNOT BEAT ANY CLARINS SKIN PRODUCTS, THEIR EYE MAKE UP REMOVER EXCELLENT TOO
customer_reviews.author: margaret

customer_reviews.title: Skin care
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for a long time. They are great for my face!!!!
customer_reviews.author: donna oplinger

customer_reviews.title: I really love clarins products
customer_reviews.text: I really love clarins products. I am up there in age but no signs of wrinkles in my neck at all!.
customer_reviews.author: flowkay

customer_reviews.title: leaked out
customer_reviews.text: when I opened the cap it showed like this. the cream leaked out of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: zhang ting

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this cream for a few years. It works. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product received in good condition. The smell and texture of the cream is very nice
customer_reviews.author: Anonymouss

customer_reviews.title: I was extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The cream does not work at all. I was extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Clarins!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Clarins for years and just started with the neck cream. I am very happy with this product. I love the smell and the way it glides on with no heavy greasy feeling.
customer_reviews.author: teresa lee

customer_reviews.title: love this cream-use it nightly
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this neck cream every night for more than a year. I am 48 years old and wanted to take care of the skin of my neck. So far, so good and really happy with the smell, texture and absorption of this cream.
customer_reviews.author: K. S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great neck cream, I've tried them all. This one works for me, finally!
customer_reviews.author: Daphne

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, pleasing results
customer_reviews.text: First time trying this product and I like very much. It's smooth, not greasy, thick yet not heavy and I do see results. The wrinkles on my neck seem less evident. I most likely will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim P

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality brand.
customer_reviews.text: I use a lot of Clarins products. I love them. Have been using for over 20 years. Can't beat the quality and success.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bayliss

customer_reviews.title: Clarins Neck Cream...LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, and feels great. Light and makes my neck feel great. Really seems to help my aging neck. Lol
customer_reviews.author: CristinaB

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good right after you apply, and then my neck was right back to the way it was before.
customer_reviews.author: gwen blanco

customer_reviews.title: Good for hydration
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t seen miraculous results and been using it for over 3 months. A little improvement in hydration and elasticity but lines are still there.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Clarins is the best. still trying it out. I love it
customer_reviews.author: edoishesp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin & this product works well without irritating my skin
customer_reviews.author: Still beautiful

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this product. Light and non-greasy for night!
customer_reviews.author: R. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: So far, I'm not impressed. Just to humor myself I started using this on one side of my neck and Gold Bond Firming on the other. The Clarins is a little greasier whereas the Gold Bond is creamy and readily absorbed. Based on a couple of weeks, I think I'm getting a better result from the GB AND it was about 1/5 of the price of Clarins.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your neck in best possible shape.
customer_reviews.text: This really works on me. I have used it many years and my kids can tell when I run out!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Watson

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Exceeded my expectations.........
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product daily for 2 months and have definitely noticed a big different in the softness of the skin on my neck and no longer feel I have "Turkey neck" and have to cover my neck up. I love this product! Gentle application with upward strokes is how I apply it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Rose

product_meta.title: Clarins Extra-Firming Neck Anti-Wrinkle Rejuvenating Cream, 1.6 Ounce
product_meta.description: Extra-firming neck anti wrinkle rejuvenating cream was launched by the design house of Clarins. It tightens and brightens the vulnerable skin on chest and neck. Restoring the look of youth and elegance to aging skin.
feature_bullets: It tightens and brightens the vulnerable skin on chest and neck
Restoring the look of youth and elegance to aging skin
It is recommended for casual wear
